EmailTemplate.subject: REGISTER TODAY: Honeywell Aerospace Airlines Operators Conference, Asia Pacific
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Honeywell Aerospace Airlines Operators Conference, Asia Pacific
Dear Customer,
We are hosting two airline operator conferences in Asia this October and hope you can join us for this exciting event!
Here are three reasons why you should attend these conferences:
1. Technical and Reliability Updates Engage with Honeywell Product Support experts to review product reliability updates across several key Honeywell systems.
2. Honeywell Technology Updates and Connected Maintenance Strategies Meet with our Avionics team, who will present the latest in Safety/Flight Efficiency and Connected Maintenance.
3. Honeywell's Connected Solutions Learn more about our digital experience road map. Honeywell also looks forward to sharing the improvements we have made, largely based on your feedback from recent industry surveys.
Date Location
October 16-17
Malaysia
JW Marriott Hotel Kuala Lumpur 183 Jalan Bukit Bintang Kuala Lumpur 55100 Malaysia Reserve your room. <[[https://www.marriott.com/meeting-event-hotels/group-corporate-travel/groupCorp.mi?resLinkData=Honeywell%20Operator%20Conferences%5Ekuldt%60honhona%60460%60MYR%60false%602%6010/12/18%6010/20/18%6010/7/18&app=resvlink&stop_mobi=yes]]>
October 23-24
China
Renaissance Haikou Hotel No 39 Yangshan Boulevard, Longhua District Haikou Hainan 571155 ChinaÂ Reserve your room. <[[https://www.marriott.com/meeting-event-hotels/group-corporate-travel/groupCorp.mi?resLinkData=Honeywell%20group%20%5EHAKMH%60A96A96A%7CA96A96B%60471.70%60CNY%60false%602%6010/17/18%6010/29/18%6010/12/18&app=resvlink&stop_mobi=yes]]>
REGISTER NOW <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/201810_HOC_APAC.html]]>
We look forward to seeing you!
Andrew Kirk Vice President, Customer & Product Support, Asia Pacific Honeywell International Inc.
